name: week-2-assessment
description: ##Summary Week 1 assessment will be used to assess your understanding of the material provided in the past week. At the end of the period, commit your work and submit a pull request.

scripts.watch-js: watchify client/main.js -o build/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ react es2015 ] ] -dv
scripts.build-js: browserify client/main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ react es2015 ] ] > build/bundle.js
scripts.test: npm run build-js && mocha -R mocha-email-reporter -O json=test/output.json --timeout 10000 test/week-2-assessment.js
